Class CompanyRepController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseController
controller.CompanyRepController
public class CompanyRepController extends BaseController
Controller for company representative actions (manage internships and applications for the rep's company).

This controller provides methods for company representatives to:

  • Create, view, edit, and delete internship postings
  • Manage application visibility
  • Review and process internship applications
  • Track application status (successful/unsuccessful)
The controller enforces business rules including:
  • Maximum number of active postings per representative
  • Ownership validation for all operations
  • Status-based restrictions on editing and deletion
  • Parameter validation for internship creation and updates

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRepController

      public CompanyRepController(CompanyRepRepository reps, InternshipRepository internships, ApplicationRepository applications)
      Constructs a CompanyRepController wired to necessary repositories.
      Parameters:
      reps - the company representative repository
      internships - the internship repository
      applications - the internship application repository

  • Method Details

    • listInternships

      public List<Internship> listInternships(String repEmail)
      Lists all internships owned by the company representative's company.
      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      Returns:
      a list of internships belonging to the representative's company, or an empty list if no internships exist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the company representative is not found

    • getInternship

      public Internship getInternship(String repEmail, String internshipId)
      Retrieves details for a specific internship owned by the company representative.
      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship to retrieve
      Returns:
      the internship with the specified ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the company representative or internship is not found
      SecurityException - if the internship does not belong to the representative's company

    • createInternship

      public String createInternship(String repEmail, String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int maxSlots)
      Creates a new internship posting for the company representative's company.
      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      title - the title of the internship
      description - the description of the internship
      level - the experience level required for the internship
      preferredMajor - the preferred major for applicants
      openDate - the date when applications open
      closeDate - the date when applications close
      maxSlots - the maximum number of available slots
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the newly created internship
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the company representative is not found, or if any parameter validation fails
      IllegalStateException - if the representative has reached the maximum number of active postings

    • editInternship

      public void editInternship(String repEmail, String internshipId, String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int maxSlots)
      Edits an existing internship posting.

      Only allowed when the internship is in an editable state (not approved or rejected).

      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship to edit
      title - the new title of the internship
      description - the new description of the internship
      level - the new experience level required for the internship
      preferredMajor - the new preferred major for applicants
      openDate - the new date when applications open
      closeDate - the new date when applications close
      maxSlots - the new maximum number of available slots
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the company representative or internship is not found, or if any parameter validation fails
      SecurityException - if the internship does not belong to the representative's company
      IllegalStateException - if the internship cannot be edited due to its status

    • deleteInternship

      public void deleteInternship(String repEmail, String internshipId)
      Deletes an internship posting if allowed by its status.
      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship to delete
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the company representative or internship is not found
      SecurityException - if the internship does not belong to the representative's company
      IllegalStateException - if the internship cannot be deleted due to its status

    • setVisibility

      public void setVisibility(String repEmail, String internshipId, boolean visible)
      Sets the visibility of an internship posting.
      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship
      visible - true to make the internship visible, false to hide it
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the company representative or internship is not found
      SecurityException - if the internship does not belong to the representative's company

    • listApplications

      public List<InternshipApplication> listApplications(String repEmail, String internshipId)
      Lists all applications for a specific internship owned by the company representative.
      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship
      Returns:
      a list of applications for the specified internship, or an empty list if no applications exist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the company representative or internship is not found
      SecurityException - if the internship does not belong to the representative's company

    • markApplicationSuccessful

      public void markApplicationSuccessful(String repEmail, String applicationId)
      Marks an application as SUCCESSFUL (offer extended to applicant).
      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      applicationId - the unique identifier of the application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the company representative or application is not found
      SecurityException - if the application does not belong to the representative's company

    • markApplicationUnsuccessful

      public void markApplicationUnsuccessful(String repEmail, String applicationId)
      Marks an application as UNSUCCESSFUL (rejected).
      Parameters:
      repEmail - the email address of the company representative
      applicationId - the unique identifier of the application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the company representative or application is not found
      SecurityException - if the application does not belong to the representative's company
